title: Viral TikTok Challenge Raises $50 Million for Children's Hospitals
introText: A viral TikTok challenge has raised over $50 million for children's hospitals worldwide. The #DanceForKids challenge saw celebrities and ordinary users donating to participate, demonstrating social media's power for good.

content.content: The #DanceForKids challenge asked participants to post a dance video and donate $10 to children's hospitals. Over 5 million videos were posted, raising $50 million in two weeks.
Major celebrities including actors, athletes, and musicians participated, dramatically amplifying reach. Several donated $100,000 or more while participating.
Funds will support pediatric research and patient care at children's hospitals in 30 countries. The campaign demonstrates how viral moments can drive meaningful charitable giving.
